entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Wawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:37 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 08:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -0.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -1.4°C
Wind: S 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
